categoryBlurb: You know who you are—the diehard who supports your team no matter what. You're no fair-weather fan...and for you, we have curated our favorite group gift ideas to celebrate the Seahawks making it to the Big Game. Win or lose, it's a momentous achievement—and we think that deserves the ultimate group gift.

productList.productName: Men’s + Women’s + Child’s Jersey (Set of 3 Seahawks Jerseys)
productList.productDescription: The ultimate package for the family of the 12th Man - celebrate the Seahawks with a set of three (3) Seattle Seahawks Russell Wilson Super Bowl XLIX Game jerseys. Features the team graphics to let everyone know that you and your loved ones are fans of the Seahawks. 100% Recycled polyesterFit: Nike Game Jerseys fit true to size. We recommend ordering one size larger than you normally wear for a looser fit or up two sizes if you plan on layering underneath the jersey.  You’ll order sizing once the Gift campaign is created through the Gift Concierge. Machine wash & mesh side panels for extra breathability. Real NFL shield at collar. Officially licensed shirts. Satin twill woven jock tag. Screen print name, numbers and logos. Tagless collar and tailored designed for movement.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Men’s + Women’s + Child’s Jersey (Set of 3 SeahawksJerseys)

productList.productName: 2 Bottles of Grongnet (Magnum) Cuvée Brut Tradition (1.5L)
productList.productDescription:
Cecile Grongnet does almost everything herself. Her precision and the long heritage of generations that came before her is obvious in this cuvée. It has a hugely expressive nose with notes of baked bread, roasted almonds, and aromas linked to aging in a cellar. It is fresh and harmonious with beautiful acid and nice bitters combining for a tart finish.
REGION: Côte Des Blancs
VILLAGE: Etoges
RODUCER: Cecile Grongnet is the fifth generation of the Grongnet family to run this operation and she does almost everything by herself. The Champagne house has been in the same location since 1885 when her great great grandfather started the business. They are located in the village of Etoges, which is in the middle of the Côte des Blancs region of Champagne. They are one of only 26 Champagne houses to be part of the “Special Club”, which is an exclusive club comprised of only the top Champagne houses elected by their peers. The cuvées that she produces all have a very low dosage and most undergo no malolatic fermentation. This means that the grapes she uses are of the best quality; otherwise the end result would be austere and unbalanced.
FOOD PAIRING IDEAS: It can be served as an aperitif of course, but also with shellfish and especially clams. Pasta or pizza with sauces that aren’t too spicy or sweet will also work well with this dry and crisp cuvée.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter 2 Bottles of Grongnet (Magnum) Cuvée Brut Tradition (1.5L)

productList.productName: Richard Sherman Seattle Seahawks Hand-Autographed 16X20 Brady Photo Inscribed 'YOU MAD BRO!' with Frame
productList.productDescription: Seahawks Super Star Corner Richard Sherman personally hand-signed this 16x20 Photo. Sherman is one of the most talented and controversial players in the league. He backs up his legendary trash-talking with incredible plays on the field. In 2013, Sherman's popularity skyrocketed and he finished in the top 10 of jersey sales in the NFL.. This Richard Sherman Autograph is Guaranteed Authentic with a Richard Sherman Hologram of Authenticity.  Once your GiftStarter campaign is created, you can work with our Gift Concierge to pick out just the perfect frame to go with this amazing gift.
